General.Name: Tangel Publishing
General.Description: Tangel Culture Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, distribution, agency, and operation of mobile games, book publishing and distribution, and educational businesses in China. The company is involved in the mass reading business; and operation of public welfare funding platform. It also provides psychological counselling and technical support services; and construction services for psychological consultation rooms. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Greenland Central Plaza, Building 6, Changsha, China, 410013
